ichargeSubheader.label: icharge offers a one-stop self-service mobile power bank rental service, providing a solution for charging your mobile devices while on the go.

conveniencedesc.label: Offering rentable power banks enhances the convenience of your location, which can lead to increased foot traffic, longer and frequent visits.

costEffectivedesc.label: At a very low cost of P29.00 per 30 minutes, patrons will be encouraged to stay longer and enjoy more of what your venue hast to offer, thereby boosting overall customer satisfaction.

flexibledesc.label: iCharge works to effortlessly and seamlessly integrate with a wide range of businesses and venues, offering reliable and flexible support no matter the location.

WeOfferServices.label: WE OFFER SERVICES THAT FITS YOUR NEEDS

scanDescription.label: Scan the QR code at any iCharge station to rent. Download the app.

topUpDescription.label: Top up your credit using any payment method.

chargeDescription.label: Grab a power bank and charge your device anywhere.

returnDescription.label: Insert the power bank into iCharge station. Pay the rental fee.

stayPoweredDesc.label: Convenient, reliable charging solutions for all your devices, wherever you go.

customerServicesubHeading.label: Use the form below to send us an email and we will respond within 12 hours. If you need an immediate answer, our Customer Service team is just a click away, chat with us!

items.question: How can I find the nearest iCharge station?
items.answer: You can use the iCharge app or visit our website to locate nearby stations. Our real-time map will help you quickly find the closest station.

items.question: How do I rent the power bank?
items.answer: Download the iCharge app from the App Store or Google Play. Use the app to scan the QR code on any iCharge station and follow the instructions.

items.question: Can I use the power bank to charge any device?
items.answer: Yes, the power banks are compatible with most smartphones and devices.

items.question: Is there a time limit for how long I can use the power bank?
items.answer: No, you can rent the power bank for as long as you need. Keep in mind that rental charges will apply based on the duration.

items.question: How do I check how long I’ve had the power bank and the cost so far?
items.answer: This information is available in the app as soon as you start the rental. It shows both the duration and the cost, and will inform you about any unpaid usage.

items.question: How do I return the power bank?
items.answer: Just place the power bank into any empty slot at an iCharge station. Make sure it's fully pushed in.

items.question: What if the station is full when I try to return the power bank?
items.answer: You can return the power bank at the same station or any nearby iCharge station. Just check the iCharge app for available slots.

items.question: How much does it cost to rent a power bank?
items.answer: The rental fee depends on the duration and location. Our standard hourly rate is Php 49. Please check the iCharge app for current rates.

items.question: How do I pay for the rental charges?
items.answer: After logging in to the app, use a valid payment method (GrabPay, Maya, GCash, Alipay, WeChat Pay, BDO, or UnionBank). The rental fee will be displayed in the iCharge app along with unpaid usage notifications.

items.question: How can I refund my deposit?
items.answer: Go to the 'Wallet' page in the app. Press the 'Refund' button and submit. The refund will be returned to the same account you used to top-up.

items.question: If I’m issued a refund, how long will it take?
items.answer: Once a refund is processed, it may take up to 15 days for the amount to reflect in your account.

items.question: What if I’m overcharged?
items.answer: If you think you've been overcharged, contact the in-app support team. They will help resolve the issue.

items.question: What do I do if I can’t release a power bank from the station?
items.answer: If you're having trouble, contact the support team through the app. They will assist you with the issue.

items.question: What do I do if the station is empty?
items.answer: Check the iCharge app for nearby stations with available power banks.

items.question: What should I do if the app isn’t working?
items.answer: Try refreshing the app first. If that doesn’t help, delete and reinstall the iCharge app. If the issue persists, contact customer support for assistance.

items.question: I haven’t received a verification code for the app. What should I do?
items.answer: Make sure your phone has a strong mobile data or Wi-Fi signal. If the issue persists, double-check the phone number you entered or contact iCharge support.

items.question: How can I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach support through the iCharge app or by emailing us at ichargebgc@gmail.com. We're here to help!

items.question: What happens if I lose the power bank?
items.answer: If you lose the power bank, contact customer support through the iCharge app.

items.question: How to delete your account?
items.answer:
To delete your account.

1. Open the app
2. Tap Settings ->Account cancellation

Warning

Once your account is deleted, your personal data will be removed and you will no longer be able to use your account.
• Delete your user information.
• Your user account is unable to recover.
• Re-register will be a new account.

Please make sure that all transactions have been closed and no disputes.
After the account is deleted, It is deemed to automatically give up the rights and interest such as the return of funds that may have occurred in historical transactions.

aboutHeading.label: We believe in a world where staying connected is effortless. With our innovative power bank stations, we make sure your customers can stay powered and ready for any adventure, anywhere.

whoWeAreDesc1.label: Quanta Dance Inc. provides on-the-go charging solutions to keep people connected in today's digital world.

whoWeAreDesc2.label: Our nationwide network of iCharge powerbank stations ensures that individuals and businesses can access reliable power anytime, anywhere across the Philippines.

whoWeAreDesc3.label: We believe that staying powered is essential to staying connected, whether during everyday activities or critical moments.

OurMissionDesc.label: We aim to deliver convenient and reliable powerbank lending stations across the Philippines, with future expansion plans to serve global markets. By partnering with businesses, we enhance the customer experience in retail, hospitality, transport, healthcare, and event venues, offering a seamless solution for staying powered on the go.

ourVisionDesc.label: To be the leading provider of mobile charging solutions, ensuring that everyone, everywhere, remains connected at all times, whether locally or globally. Our vision includes scaling our solutions to reach high-traffic areas not just in the Philippines, but in major cities worldwide.

ourReachDesc1.label: Our iCharge stations are rapidly expanding in malls, restaurants, hospitals, transport hubs, and event venues across the country.

ourReachDesc2.label: With integrated payment systems such as GCash, GrabPay, Alipay, Maya, WeChat Pay, UnionBank and BDO, our stations offer convenient, hassle-free access to mobile power, making it easier than ever to stay charged.

ourReachDesc3.label: This flexibility mirrors global charging networks, offering customers a seamless experience wherever they go.

summaryDesc1.label: Our proprietary technology ensures a seamless charging experience for both businesses and end-users. The system features real-time monitoring and an intuitive interface that simplifies the management of charging stations.

keyFeaturesList11.label: Real-Time Monitoring: Efficiently manage stations with live data insights.

keyFeaturesList12.label: Global Payment Integration: Supports various payment methods, including GCash, GrabPay, Alipay, and credit cards, enabling access to charging services both locally and internationally.

keyFeaturesList13.label: 24/7 Technical Support: Available for all partners and end-users, ensuring operational reliability and customer satisfaction.

summaryDesc2.label: Our proprietary software ensures a seamless charging experience with real-time monitoring and an easy-to-use interface. The software supports businesses in efficiently managing charging stations, offering quick transactions and smooth operations.

keyFeaturesList21.label: Real-Time Monitoring: Efficiently manage stations with live data insights.

keyFeaturesList22.label: User-Friendly Interface: Simplifies the customer charging experience.

keyFeaturesList23.label: 24/7 Technical Support: Available for both businesses and customers, ensuring operational reliability.

summaryDesc3.label: Our powerbank stations are built with custom-designed hardware that is adaptable to different locations. Whether in large shopping malls or small cafes, our stations are versatile and efficient.

keyFeaturesList31.label: Scalability to meet the needs of both large and small spaces.

keyFeaturesList32.label: High capacity for busy areas with heavy foot traffic.

keyFeaturesList33.label: Easy Accessibility for users to rent and return powerbanks seamlessly.
